ROW.NAME: 报表分析主题定义
ROW.COLLIST: ID 主题编号,NAME 主题名称,REFMOD 引用模型内部编号,HDIM 水平方向维度,VDIM 垂直方向维度,CRTUSER 创建人,TO_CHAR(CRTDAT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') 创建时间

ROW.DATDSC: delete from CHARTSHOW where sytid = '[%sytid]' and TOPICID = '[%noteid]'
insert into CHARTSHOW select sys_guid(),'[%sytid]','[%noteid]',id,name,'[%SYS_USRID]',sysdate from V_MID_PICNOTE where id = '[%chartid]'
select id,name from CHARTSHOW where sytid = '[%sytid]' and TOPICID = '[%noteid]' order by id
